flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Mayer wants to get a $1000 x 3/10 = $<<1000*3/10=300>>300 profit.
So, he will sell each Corgi dog for $1000 + $300 = $<<1000+300=13000>>13000.
Hence, his friend should pay $13000 x 2 = $<<13000*2=26000>>26000.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1300, not 13000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
